class tibber.client.Client(token: str, immediate_update: bool = True)¶

Bases: tibber.networking.query_executor.QueryExecutor

The main Tibber class to communicate with the Tibber API.

tibber.home module¶

Classes for retrieving data of a Tibber Home

class tibber.home.DecoratedTibberHome¶

Bases: tibber.home.TibberHome

A Tibber home with methods to get/fetch home information and decorators to subscribe to real time data.

class tibber.home.TibberHome¶

Bases: object

A Tibber home with methods to get/fetch home information without the decorator functions to subscribe to live data.
